page.title: 07Housing Around Scoutmoor.
page.content: Many of the abandoned farm houses have been bought up and converted into luxury homes for those who can afford them.Main farm houses and barns have been knocked through and internally modernised, but keeping their older looking exterior. Lodge Lane in Turn Village,contains {Lodge Mill}and cottages beyond.These originally housed the mill workers but are now owned privately by commutors . Lime Leach house was obviously an 18th century loomshop and the takin'in steps to the eastern gable still remain.Today it consists of three privately owned cottages, two of which are presently occupied.
